methods.name: getVideoGame
methods.doc: Retrieves a VideoGame object based on lookup by id

methods.name: createVideoGame
methods.doc: Creates a new VideoGame object with given attributes, and stores it into the databases. Starts as Pending.

methods.name: approveGame
methods.doc: Moves VideoGame from Pending to Active status

methods.name: deactivateGame
methods.doc: Moves VideoGame to InActive from anything

methods.name: alterQuantity
methods.doc: Updates VideoGame quantity by a positive or negative number.

methods.name: editVideoGame
methods.doc: Retrieves a VideoGame by ID, and modifies its attributes according to editVideoGame's arguments before re-storing

methods.name: searchByKeyword
methods.doc: Returns all VideoGames that have a name or description that match the keyword. Not case sensitive.

methods.name: searchByCategory
methods.doc: Returns all VideoGames that have a given Category.

methods.name: averageRatingOf
methods.doc: Gets average Rating of VideoGame. Rounded to nearest star value.
